name: Generator & Battery Rebate
description: $300 rebate on purchase of generator or battery storage for power outage preparedness; must be in Tier 2 or 3 High Fire-Threat District and enrolled in CARE or FERA
fullDescription: PG&E provides rebates for generators and portable battery storage to help customers in high fire-threat areas prepare for power outages during Public Safety Power Shutoffs.
whatTheyOffer:
- $300 rebate on generator purchase
- $300 rebate on portable battery storage
- For customers in Tier 2 or 3 High Fire-Threat Districts
- Must be enrolled in CARE or FERA
- Helps maintain power during PSPS events
- One rebate per household per year
howToGetIt:
1. Verify you're in Tier 2 or 3 High Fire-Threat District
2. Must be enrolled in CARE or FERA program
3. Purchase qualifying generator or battery
4. Apply online within 90 days of purchase
5. Submit proof of purchase and CARE/FERA enrollment
6. Receive rebate check
keywords: generator, battery, rebate, PG&E, PSPS, power outage, fire, CARE, FERA, backup power
